name: SEQUENCE STORM Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This contains full length versions of most of the tracks in SEQUENCE STORM, short edits, and a few bonus tracks. There are 81 tracks in total.

short_description: This contains full length versions of most of the tracks in SEQUENCE STORM, short edits, and a few bonus tracks. There are 81 tracks in total.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: x86-compatible 2.5GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 520
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: x86-compatible 3.5GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

legal_notice:
Interference, Stuck Neck Cut, Suckerpunch, Tell Me Another One,
The End Is Near - by ypmekitd - used by permission

Don't Go, In Love, Tragedy, Rome Is Burning,
Shared Dreams - by 2DCAT - used by permission

Young Jaguar Theme, Devious Rhinoceros, Wretched Hyena -
by Young Jaguar - used by permission

All other music copyright 2018 SPECIAL MAGIC GAMES, LLC
